references.reason: This paper introduced the discrete cosine transform (DCT), a fundamental compression algorithm used in the FAST tokenization method.

references.paper_title: pi_0: A vision-language-action flow model for general robot control
references.reason: This paper introduced the pi_0 model, a state-of-the-art diffusion-based VLA model, against which the proposed FAST-based method is compared.

references.paper_title: RT-1: Robotics transformer for real-world control at scale
references.reason: This paper introduced RT-1, a foundational vision-language-action (VLA) model, providing a baseline for comparison and illustrating the challenges of existing action tokenization techniques.
This paper introduced OpenVLA, another prominent VLA model, used as a comparison point and highlighting the limitations of prior action tokenization methods.

references.paper_title: DROID: A large-scale in-the-wild robot manipulation dataset
references.reason: This paper introduced the DROID dataset, a large-scale benchmark for robot manipulation tasks, showcasing the ability of the FAST method to handle high-frequency data and challenging tasks.
